TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_Naluwan, title = Naluwan, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/Naluwan} }

S.FORM: == satangahan : == Naluwan u zuma a kamu : nu Hulam : u canan ku Naluwan(Naluwan是什麼?)ː u niyazu' nu Sakizaya i Kuhkuh. caykayadah ku tademaw i tini. u namakay i Maibul a niyazu'. namakayniay a nasulitan nasakamuan atu natinengan ː malaalitin tu i hekalay atu zumaay a natinengan ː

== satangahan : == Nalowan o zoma a kamo : no Holam : o canan ko Nalowan(Nalowan是什麼?)ː o niyazo' no Sakizaya i Kohkoh. caykayadah ko tademaw i tini. o namakay i Maibol a niyazo'. namakayniay a nasolitan nasakamoan ato natinengan ː malaalitin to i hekalay ato zomaay a natinengan ː
